files.filename: [Problem Brief] Teammate Diagnosis of Merchant Issues (2).txt

themes: Frustration for both teammates and merchants

suggestedArtifacts.name: Merchant Support Journey Map
suggestedArtifacts.description: Visualize the total support experience for merchants, focusing on pain points and areas of friction in account management.
suggestedArtifacts.reasoning: The detailed account of current process challenges highlights significant pain points that can be effectively illustrated through a journey map.

suggestedArtifacts.name: Teammate Empathy Map
suggestedArtifacts.description: Create an empathy map to understand the frustrations, needs, and motivations of teammates handling account management issues.
suggestedArtifacts.reasoning: Teammate feedback indicates significant emotional and operational challenges, which can be addressed by empathizing with their experience.

suggestedArtifacts.name: TruthFinder Tool Feature Matrix
suggestedArtifacts.description: Develop a feature matrix for the proposed TruthFinder tool, prioritizing features based on identified merchant issues and teammate feedback.
suggestedArtifacts.reasoning: The proposed tool aims to address specific diagnostic challenges and needs, making a detailed feature matrix essential for development.

dataSegments.name: Teammates
dataSegments.description: Support agents handling merchant account issues, facing challenges with resolution processes and diagnostics.

dataSegments.name: Merchants
dataSegments.description: Merchants reporting account management issues, experiencing frustration due to inadequate support.
